description: Quick cook polenta makes this dish as speedy to make as it is delicious.
keywords: Baked polenta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Polenta with Garlic Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the mushrooms for 10 minutes. Stir in the garlic and thyme and cook for 2 minutes.
Bring the stock to the boil in a large pan and slowly whisk in the polenta in a steady stream. Cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly, until it begins to thicken. Stir in the parmesan and butter.
Serve the polenta in bowls with mushrooms and fresh parsley on top.
